TITLE: Implementing the CN Utility Function in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Creates a utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to prevent Tailwind CSS style conflicts when conditionally constructing className strings. "new-component": { name: "new-component", filePath: "preview/components/new-component.tsx", preview: lazy(() => import("@/preview/components/new-component")), }, }, }; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Component Preview in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a preview for a new component, demonstrating its appearance and functionality.
